duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the Sr. Program Manager in the implementation and maintenance of program strategies and initiatives.
Development and maintenance of program timeline, plans, and milestones according to prioritization.
Risk-based prioritization of program execution and implementation of program changes.
Facilitating process development meetings, management presentations, and meeting note-taking and scheduling.
Identification and timely escalation of project risks to management, working with the team to develop risk mitigations plans.
Assist in the development of a robust project plan and integration of workstream project Gantts for the overall program.
Manage interdependency among workstreams, identify and communicate issues, and drive improvement of workstream processes and efficiency.
Develop and maintain integrated project plans, weekly meetings, project Gantts, issue meeting minutes, management updates, risk log, decision log, and timely analysis and update on task issues.
Schedule and run program meetings to resolve issues and track/facilitate program execution activities as required.
Work with cross-functional teams in a fast-paced, high-visibility environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Health Sciences, Business, or Financial Management (Master's preferred)
